title: Sky Dragon's Fury
summaries: The Sky Dragon's Fury is a Hardmode, post-Golem melee weapon that possesses two different modes of attack. When pressing the ⚒ Use / Attack button while it is held, the Sky Dragon's Fury spins in a 360-degree radius around the player while leaving behind a light blue energy trail, damaging and inflicting knockback to any enemy that comes into contact with the staff while it is spinning. When pressing the ⚷ Open / Activate button with the Sky Dragon's Fury, it fires three blue energy orbs in a spreading formation, which, after traveling a certain distance or upon contact with an enemy or solid tile, burst into damaging rings of electricity. The Sky Dragon's Fury has a 25*1/4 (25%) of being dropped by Betsy during Tier 3 of the Old One's Army event.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Tooltip: Right click while holding for an alternate attack!
